comment.comment:
上課人數
主要為吳教授研究室內學生，以及大四生，學生只有6個，如果未出席，會很明顯。

上課形式及內容
以簡報為主，教授希望上課可以有課本作為輔助，但沒有也沒關係。

-Outline
⚫ Introduction
⚫ Combustion thermochemistry
⚫ Chemical kinetics
⚫ Homogeneous systems
⚫ Transport properties and governing equations
⚫ Laminar premix flames
⚫ Laminar diffusion flames
⚫ Pollutant emissions
⚫ Heterogeneous combustion
⚫ Introduction to turbulent combustion

-Textbook
⚫ S.R. Turns, An Introduction to Combustion 2nd ed., McGraw-Hill

評分方式
⚫ Total: 110 pts
• Homeworks: 30 pts
• Take-home Midterm Exam: 20 pts
• Comprehensive Final Exam: 30 pts
• Group Project: 30 pts
⚫ NO normalization or adjustment will be made!
⚫ For those who earn more than 100 pts, the final score will be 99.
⚫ Grades will be announced on Moodle.
